name: EcoNET - True Error Detection
description: Oversaw analysis of North Carolina Weather Station Data (ECONet), applied classification techniques to determine which data points are erroneous, using multiple machine-learning techniques. Led the team and oversaw analysis of the data along with writing a detailed white paper

name: Database Management System
description: Created and designed a Multilevel Database Management system for a Publishing house. Everything from Database Design to deployment was taken into consideration. Implemented using Java along with JDBC

name: Real-time AI Video Upscaling
description: Designed a Real-time Video upscaling software using state-of-the-art techniques to create efficient AI systems. Adapted various Optimization strategies and software packages to strategically cut down existing AI models for fast processing

name: Solar Power Forecasting
description: Created a Solar Power Forecasting system using weather data from cities where weather will move toward other locations. Results were compared to previous 4-hour forecasts for Raleigh solar production

name: Chaitanya-Portfolio
description: The site you are looking at right now! It is the first iteration of my personal portfolio site, showcasing my experiences and skillsets. It features a fully responsive design, cool animations, WAI-ARIA accessibility, and dark mode. I want to thank Ng Bob Shoaun for the template

name: Expertiza
description: The Expertiza project is software to create reusable learning objects through peer review. It also supports team projects, and the submission of almost any document type, including URLs and wiki pages. This project focused on refactoring questionnaires_controller.rb by sanding down rough edges of code through the removal of the unused create_questionnaire method, breaking up the exceedingly long create method, transfer of hardcoded values in the add_new_questions method, and general code cleanup.

name: ClassMateBot
description: Led a small team in designing Discord bot in Python that is intended to help with common classroom activities for CS related classes using various APIs. Automated tasks using revision control systems and GitHub Actions to streamline testing and deployment.

name: 3D Astroids
description: 3D version of the Astroids game. Created in Unity. Contains a scoring system, a health system. animations, collisions, sound. menus and resets
